body:
Select      A.Server, A.database_name, A.last_db_backup_date, B.backup_start_date, B.expiration_date, B.backup_size, B.logical_device_name, B.physical_device_name,
            B.backupset_name, B.description
From        (Select         CONVERT(Char(100), SERVERPROPERTY('Servername')) Server, database_name, MAX(backup_finish_date) last_db_backup_date
             From           msdb.dbo.backupmediafamily
                            Inner Join msdb.dbo.backupset On msdb.dbo.backupmediafamily.media_set_id = msdb.dbo.backupset.media_set_id
             Where          msdb..backupset.type = 'D'
             Group  By      database_name) As A
            Left Join(Select    CONVERT(Char(100), SERVERPROPERTY('Servername')) Server, database_name, backup_start_date, backup_finish_date, expiration_date,
                                backup_size, logical_device_name, physical_device_name, name backupset_name, description
                      From      msdb.dbo.backupmediafamily
                                Inner Join msdb.dbo.backupset On msdb.dbo.backupmediafamily.media_set_id = msdb.dbo.backupset.media_set_id
                      Where     msdb..backupset.type = 'D') As B On A.Server = B.Server
                                                                    And A.database_name = B.database_name
                                                                    And   A.last_db_backup_date = B.backup_finish_date
Where A.database_name Like '%TEXTILE%'                                                                    
Order By    A.database_name
